Interface GroupCoordinationStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProbabilisticLoadBalancingGroupCoordinationStrategy
public interface GroupCoordinationStrategy

Author:
Panteha Saeedi (saeedi@elet.polimi.it) Gives to a GroupCommunicationManager indication in how to coordinate a group.
